HCONTROL
Usage: hcontrol build <house vnum> <exit dir> <player name> hcontrol destroy <house vnum> hcontrol pay <house vnum> hcontrol show
House control, controls the addition, removal, and payments of houses. Hcontrol show will show all the houses currently defined in the game along with their last 'rent' payment date.
See also: HOUSE, HOUSES
